law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 108, sec. 18. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 10. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 14. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2711a-188.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Pay for services and attendance at courts and boards.
